titles.title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to redefine the eastern and middle judicial districts of North Carolina.
To amend title 28, United States Code, to redefine the eastern and middle judicial districts of North Carolina.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This bill moves portions of four counties encompassing the Fort Bragg Military Reservation and Camp Mackall from the Middle District to the Eastern District of North Carolina.
